summary: This document is a summary of account transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from October 1 to October 31, 2015. It details the account balance, deposits, checks paid, and other debits, highlighting significant transactions during this period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $175,625.89 on October 1, 2015.
A total of $31,433.23 was deposited into the account during October 2015.
Multiple checks were paid out, including one for $26,074.00 on October 19, 2015.
The ending balance of the account as of October 31, 2015, was $174,781.43.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during this statement period.
